function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific criteria addressing virus propagation in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of viruses","Mitigation":"Update existing criteria to include specific requirements for virus propagation mitigation","Technologies":"Smart and innovative technologies for virus mitigation, such as air purification systems and UV disinfection","People":"Construction and building stakeholders, public occupants","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, building designers, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Emphasis on environmental impact over public health in materials choice criteria","Impact":"Potential use of materials that do not mitigate pathogens, leading to increased risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Modify materials choice criteria to prioritize public health and minimize pathogen spread","Technologies":"Use of antimicrobial materials, surface coatings, and hygiene-conscious design","People":"Building material suppliers, architects, construction companies","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, architects, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of indoor environmental factors in relation to public health","Impact":"Suboptimal indoor environments that do not support public health and well-being","Mitigation":"Integrate indoor environmental quality criteria focused on public health and wellness","Technologies":"Smart sensors for air quality monitoring, ventilation systems, natural light optimization","People":"Occupants, building designers, facility managers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, architects, and public health organizations"}]}
